meanings.definition: Think deeply or focus one's mind for a period of time, in silence or with the aid of chanting, for religious or spiritual purposes.
meanings.sent1: She meditated on the meaning of life under the peaceful tree.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, he meditated to find inner peace.
meanings.sent3: The cat meditated on whether to chase the butterfly or take a nap.
meanings.sent4: As the waves crashed, she meditated on the vastness of the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The wise old owl meditated on the mysteries of the night.

meanings.sent1: He meditated on the decision to move to a new city.
meanings.sent2: The students meditated on the consequences of their actions.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel meditated on the best way to reach the acorns.
meanings.sent4: As the rain fell, she meditated on the beauty of nature.
meanings.sent5: The detective meditated on the clues to solve the mystery.

meanings.sent1: She meditated on the details of her upcoming presentation.
meanings.sent2: The team meditated on the strategy for the upcoming match.
meanings.sent3: The chef meditated on the perfect recipe for the special occasion.
meanings.sent4: As the artist painted, she meditated on the colors to use.
meanings.sent5: The architect meditated on the design of the new building.
